ComicInfo.Summary:
Upon coming back home, Jane and Heather are thrilled to find that this time, their footage of the Otherworld is GROUNDBREAKING. Greatness is on the horizon, as soon as they can get through the hardest part-editing.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Christine Larsen | 1 | Sub | PreOrder Cover | Sarah Stern | 2 |
